title: (x) Rexorama magazine stencil face - Cargo {Yves}
content:
Hello everybody  
do you know this font  
http://www.rexclub.com/rexorama/rexorama.swf  
using for Rexorama.

It’a stencil so great!

Thanks for your help  
mushimushi

author: mushimushi

comments.content: [Cargo](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329200402/http:/www.optimo.ch/pages/departement/index.php?id_categorie=2&id_font=1), designed by [Gilles Gavillet](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Gilles%20Gavillet), available from [Optimo](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329200402/http:/www.optimo.ch/home.php) in Switzerland.
